title: Visual State
description: The current visual state (image) of the device - based on the interaction conditions met

default.description: Whether the visual state is the default state. If true, the visual state will be shown if no conditions of other visual states apply.

name.description: Name of the interaction name to compare against

image.description: Path to the image asset corresponding to the visual state

position.description: Optional position override for this visual state. If specified, overrides the device's default position properties for this state only.

x.description: The x-coordinate override for this visual state

y.description: The y-coordinate override for this visual state

scale.description: The scale factor override for this visual state

origin.description: The horizontal origin override for this visual state. The origin maps the relationship between the size and position of the Game Object.
